question_text: In a virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI), what role does the local client device primarily play?
answer_options: It runs the full desktop operating system locally
It manages VM creation and deletion
It displays output and captures input for the remote virtual desktop
It hosts the virtual machine on behalf of other clients
correct_answer: It displays output and captures input for the remote virtual desktop
